Articles.Content:
Hi,

(hopefully this is a correct thread)

I started playing KSP after about a year, everything was fine back then. Now, I installed some a few mods, but i am unable to load the game. I get to the point where there is Loading at the bottom right, but that's it. Could someone help me with this? Should i drop all mods, or some famously critical?

Mods: Astronomer's Packs, Contract Configurator, Contract Pack: SCANSat, Distant Object Enhancements, HotRockets, Chatterer, Kerbal Alarm Clock, Kerbal Engineer Redux, MechJeb 2 , Module Manager, Navball Docking Alignment indicator, Planet Shine, RasterPropMonitor + core, SCANSat, Science Alert, Smoke Screen, TAC Fuel Balancer, Toolbar

Crash Report: http://we.tl/irGM717Zdj

Thanks!

The astronomers pack uses a lot of memory, you are prob hitting the limit.

Adding OpenGL or DX11 switch to the shortcut and installing active texture management and temp gauge killer should help.

http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/...y-using-OpenGL

http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/...y-reduction%21

http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/...ement-Save-RAM!

http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/120731

If that doesn't help try removing the astronomers packs.
